Articles.Content:
Hi

I am looking for an add on, a kind of TAC fuel balancer that would balance CG in flight to a preset value, or between 2 preset values, by the means of balancing fuel between tanks.

It would be great for space ships, especially when you don't burn equally fuel and Oxy. It would be good for an easier design and easier flight whatever the fuel and oxy remaining in tanks.

Thank's.

There was at one point a fuel balancer mod but I think it's dead now unfortunately. I also would like a mod to manage my center of mass, though maybe if the coder is ambitious they could make an interface similar to that of the on screen mouse control to let us move our CoM live in flight and maybe even set new presets live.

Well, I choose to balance Center of lift, because PWB fuel balancer does not work properly on spaceplane

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110616-Mod-to-balance-CG-on-spaceplane
